meanings.definition: A person who vigorously shakes their head in time to music, typically heavy metal.
meanings.sent1: At the concert, the headbangers were enjoying the music by moving their heads energetically.
meanings.sent2: The headbangers at the metal show were headbanging to the beat of the drums.
meanings.sent3: The headbangers looked like they were having a head-shaking competition at the concert.
meanings.sent4: The headbangers' synchronized head movements created a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The headbangers' head-shaking was so intense, it seemed like they were in their own world.

meanings.definition: A genre of music characterized by aggressive guitar riffs and intense drumming, often enjoyed by headbangers.
meanings.sent1: Heavy metal is a popular genre among headbangers who love energetic music.
meanings.sent2: The headbangers were thrilled to hear their favorite headbanging music at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The headbangers' playlist was filled with headbanging tunes that got them pumped up.
meanings.sent4: The headbangers' love for intense guitar riffs defined their music taste.
meanings.sent5: The headbangers' passion for headbanging music was evident in their excitement at the concert.

meanings.definition: The act of headbanging, a common form of expression at rock concerts.
meanings.sent1: Headbanging is a fun way for concert-goers to show their love for the music.
meanings.sent2: The headbangers' headbanging added to the energetic atmosphere of the rock concert.
meanings.sent3: The headbangers' headbanging was so enthusiastic that even the band members joined in.
meanings.sent4: The headbangers' synchronized head movements were like a dance to the music.
meanings.sent5: The headbangers' headbanging was a memorable part of the rock concert experience.
